lead_paragraph: Victoria Azarenka was well on her way to victory Wednesday when she drew a code violation for chastising herself too colorfully, and she later angrily jabbed at her eyes with two fingers as if to say, "Watch the ball."

headline.print_headline: Azarenka Beats Konta 6-4, 6-2 in Miami Open Quarterfinals
headline.main: Azarenka Beats Konta 6-4, 6-2 in Miami Open Quarterfinals
